tool_description: The Power Apps API offers the Microsoft Power Apps news, learning resources, events, samples and other information.
title: Power Apps Smartable

api_list.name: GetLearningResources
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://power-apps-smartable.p.rapidapi.com/learning/page/{page}/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "power-apps-smartable.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
